aboutInfo: Founded in 2016, Galeria Palácio is a contemporary art gallery based in Porto Alegre, localized in the historic center of the city. Representing emerging artists, Galeria Palácio presents a solo exhibition program dedicated to its represented artists. The gallery is housed in an almost centennial building, in a symbolic historical site to the early days of European colonization in Porto Alegre, within a perimeter that includes Palácio Piratini, Praça da Matriz, Pinacoteca Ruben Berta, Palácio da Justiça, Museu Júlio de Castilhos, among others.
